Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ViewObserver
public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewObserver, Observer
This class is part of the client side. It is an interpreter between the network and a generic view (which in this case can be CLI or GUI). It receives the messages, wraps/unwraps and pass them to the network/view.

    • onUpdateServerInfo

      public void onUpdateServerInfo​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> serverInfo)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      serverInfo - a map of server address and server port.
